values:
<small>
i just keep waiting 
am i just wasting time...

</small>
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/15262.html

another song to add to the soundtrack of my life...

push me out from the darkness
to a sky that's colored blue
somewhere someone's finding happiness,
while i'm still here so hung up on you

nothing is real
and i want you to know
that i'm not alright
when you tear open my chest,
i'll try not to flinch.
won't make promises
you taught me that
i'm still losing what's left of my self esteem
and i'm still watching the slow fading of all my daydreams.

the hardest things to say are the words that mean the most
so i'll bite my tongue til it bleeds and i doubt you'll even know
the easiest things to fake are feelings to fool someone else.
and i've been tricked for so long by you that i spent these last few months in my own hell.

a failed apology,
a day too late but now i see
that all you really want's to see me dangle neck first from a tree
but what would you need me for
you've got friends galore

i could call,
but i know that you won't be there to pick up the phone
you don't have time for me
i could call but i know you won't get the phone
don't have time for me

i hate myself
for loving you like this
i hate myself for hating myself,
just enough to love you
just enough to love you.
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/14524.html

i think of you whenever someone puts their arm around me and kisses the top of my head.  
it's like you're still here and you never left.  
it takes me back to when you used to tease me with touching the ceiling.  
even when i became a "grown-up" you would always remind me it was okay to still be a kid at heart.
now, when someone kisses my head like that...
i no long freak out and become sad.
i think of it as your way of letting me know that everything is going to be okay.
i really needed to know that it was going to be okay...
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/13997.html

i've been calling and calling for you
but you answer and i shut my mouth
i've been searching and searching for you
but myself i don't want to be found
you say i am
you say let go
you say believe
but it's not that easy for me
you say wait
you say right now
don't you see you're already one foot in the ground
you say
i've been wicked and wild and wrong
and i've wondered the price of my shame
i've been hiding my face for so long
it's a wonder that you know my name
you say come home
you say i'm here
you say there's some things you just can't control
you say let me
you say believe
why do you search for the answers you already know
you say
i am the way and the light and the truth
don't be mislead by the flight of your youth
the faith and the things you can't see to believe
what if you have faith in me
you say rest here
this is your home
don't you see that you knew i was here all along
i say

-saving jane

sometimes songs are all the words you need.
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/13621.html

i want to hold you close when you feel alone
i want to wipe your tears away as you cry
i want to be a friendly ear when you need someone to listen
i'll just be 
when you need comfort
or just need a friend
i want to be that for you and so much more
but your haunted
by things in your past
your haunted by dreams and what they may mean
these things are killing you slowly
they are going to eat you alive if you let them
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/12759.html

somewhere 
there is someone dreaming of you,
even if you've never met.
somewhere
there is something thinking of you,
even if you haven't spoken in years.
somewhere
there is someone talking to you
although they may not know if you exsist
somewhere
there is someone waiting for you
and someday you'll find them
and somewhere
someone will be dreaming of happiness
which was found
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/12090.html

i feel so helpless
so useless
but most of all i feel as if
i've said it all wrong
i just want to take away your pain
i want to make everything okay
don't shut me out
i want to help
not just for you, but for me
even if i can't find the words
always remember i'll be there
to listen or lean on
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/11979.html

i can sit and talk
in a room full of people
taking in everything around me
present, but disconnected
i always feel left out
although everyone always,
always makes sure i'm not
perhaps i'm just making myself
the outsider
perhaps it's easier that way
so when you leave, 
and you will,
i'll be okay.
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/11622.html

how do i learn
to trust you again
can you tell me?
how i want to
and yet don't
my heart can't take any more
broken promises and lies
but without you
i feel this emptiness
deep and aching
unable to be filled
because there will never be
another you
but i can't let you back in
because another time would destroy me
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/11189.html

you see me
as no other has seen me
you see me as i really am,
no pretenses, no lies
no fake and pretty world
you take the good and the bad
you see the real me
and you embrace it
and make me realize
i need to embrace myself
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/10885.html

memories
times we've shared
laughs
they all seem so distant now
sometimes i sit
and bring pen to paper
write out those things i wished i said
i try to explain those
i shouldn't have
and sometimes it all seems
so inconsequential
like none of it matters
but sometimes,
it's the only thing that does
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/10591.html

there are some things that are just meant to happen people you are supposed to know places you are meant to see there's no question of why it's just meant to be that way sometimes you'll find the purpose, more often not & that's okay mystery is the key to life pandora's box full of secrets full of hope full of everything good and bad.
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/10335.html

sometimes i wonder
what could have been
you always brightened my days
or nights, rather
they were your days
we talked about everything
& anything
we were closer than close,
although we had never met
it's probably good we drifted
because otherwise we both
may have fallen to deep
into something intangible
yet, to this day
my heart skips a beat
and a smile crosses my face
when i hear from you
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/10016.html

the other night you came to me in a dream
you said i wish i would have met you first
sometimes i do wonder
what if i hadn't been so stubborn
what if you came here first
what if i had actually studied that night?
what if you were never a part of my life
i like i would have been bereft
robed of something vital i needed at the time
but i also believe you became my crutch
my reason & excuse
& sometimes i think i missed out on living
all the time spent on you 
when i could have been elsewhere
but then you came to me
and made it all seem worthwhile
but only in a dream.
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/9824.html

we are waiting on the edge
the edge of something big
wanting to fall
wanting to be a part,
but still so unsure
and more than a bit afraid
fall in,
embrace the night
& fly...
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/9707.html

oftentimes i think i've let love pass me by
am i scared?  terrified.
as much as i long for it, i'm frightened by it
sometimes i think i've spend years,
wasted years,
holding out for something that is never going to happen
or if i'm more honest to myself,
someone, even.
someone with whom it's impossible to even dream
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/9284.html

one day i'll be able to remember
without a tear on my cheek
one day i'll even tell stories
and laugh with my children about you
one day i'll be able to think of how
you would have enjoyed your own funeral,
had you been there,
instead of remembering all the tears shed,
& one day i won't think back
to all the sadness and hurt
one day...
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/9018.html

i'm sorry i didn't get to spend as much time with you as i would have liked. i'm sorry that at times my faith in you was shaken. i'm sorry that i'm angry and upset. it is hard not to try and place blame on someone's shoulders. i've always been proud of you. although i would never tell the others you were always my favorite. you had a drinking problem. i'm sorry i didn't try to help. it is hard to not think of all the what if's the could have been's could i have made things different? could anyone? some things aren't meant to be known. i do believe all things happen for a reason. even when i struggle to find it. even when i never find it. i just wanted to tell you that i love you i'm not mad at you i'm upset. but at myself for being unaccepting of what is and of what never can be i know your up there looking out for me and i am thankful for the times we did get to spend together some people think it is healing to write the things you won't be able to say. know i can say i've attempted it. a letter. never to be sent....
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/8816.html

at times i really don't know what to say to you
you confuse me, excite me, set me free
and to be honest, it scares me
it's almost like you see right through me
you can look inside my heart and soul
and see what's there
and there are times i almost convince myself
that you are just very good with words,
and you have all the right things to say
that you're really laughing at me,
this poor, gullible, naive little girl.
although i know that isn't you
sometimes it almost helps to think that.
rather than thinking someone can see right into me
i've never met anyone quite like you
but there are some days that i don't feel up to it
i don't feel i can take being stripped to my soul
what if i'm not what you expected?


what if i'm not what i expected?
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/8524.html

you want me to write
but truth be told, 
i'm not sure what to say

should i say
how uncertain i am,
of everything? 
i am

you said it must be the moon
something was different

it was the same for me, 
but not in the same sense
emotions totally different
but the need to release them still the same

you seen a part of me
i've allowed few to see
helped to bring it out even
understand i feel terribly exposed
and quite vulnerable

i'm not good with voicing,
or even writing,
my thoughts
i suppose i've always been closed off

my friends that have lasted
seem to have me figured out.  
they can get past me pushing away


what am i so afraid of?
sometimes i don't even know
but mostly,
i'm afraid of being hurt

so many relationships,
be it friendship or otherwise,
don't work out for me
same is true for everyone,
each in their own way

i don't think that i...
that i'm as strong as they all believe
but i've made it this far
so they must see something in me
that i'm not meant to yet
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/8314.html

what do you do when everything is broken
& you've tried to pick up the pieces before
more times than you can count
what do you do when you stay
because you feel you just cant leave
too blind to see 
the pieces will never fit again
you try and try
there is always something missing
the cracks are always there
but you overlook them
everytime you put them together 
the foundation is weaker and weaker
until one day
the pieces no longer fit
so you leave them
less hurt this way anyway
you dont cut yourself putting them back
but they are still there
you walk on them everyday
you can pretend they are gone
that you can just hide them away
while every step just cuts you more
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/8124.html

there you sit
all beautiful and mysterious
up on the pedestal
i'd put you on.
for years you sat
staring down at me
looking at me 
and letting me believe
that was where 
you belonged
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/7916.html

you say
what you think i need to hear
i don't need all the lies
just for you to be there with me
for tonight
you say you'll call
that you care
because i was there
because i listened
you say
you should stay
but what i hear
is what you don't say
what i hear
through it all
is goodbye
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/12454.html

forgive me for seeing through your lies
for thinking i have no place anymore
it's just what you've lead me to believe
so why act surprised?
all those empty promises
perhaps i'm just putting more into this
forgive me for it all
forgive me for caring
for i am the only one who seems to care
i'm the one that cries and tries to hide
whatever happened to not letting that happen to us?
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/11280.html

sometimes i sit and wonder
what it is my life is supposed to mean
why am i here
for these questions i have no answers
any attempts just lead to more questions
sometimes i feel as if i haven't touched anyone
in any ways that really matter
as if anything i have said or done
could have been just as effectively said or done
by someone else
anyone else
sometimes i wonder if the only reason
i have never attempted to take my own life 
was simply because i was too weak
rather than too strong as i had always thought
and then sometimes
a friend says or does something
that makes me believe, 
for just one moment,
that i have made a difference in their life,
that i have touched them in a way no other could.
these moments are what i live for
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/7446.html

just when i think i'm through
or at least, 
have myself convinced
there you are
with your easy smile
and your dark brown eyes
i find myself falling..
falling far deeper 
farther than i've ever been before
only you have this effect on me
only you, even after so long
you'd think i'd be over it,
over you
i can convince myself i am,
sometimes
but the butterflies,
they tell me otherwise
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/7374.html

you were always there
i took for granted 
you always would be
gradually you floated away
and inside is where i hid my pain
so much heartache you caused
then one day
clear out of the blue,
you were back
and realized i had moved on
it was your turn to hid
all your emotions inside
but if you had only asked,
or had even hinted
you would have found
i had only pretended to go
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/6956.html

we were
everything i'm not
all i am no longer
and nothing that
i still could be
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/6772.html

you see through me
right to my very soul
you can see in my eyes
all the things i try to hide
i suppose this is why
i push you aside
yet sometimes still
think of ways,
to make you stay
i don't want to need you
but all these things,
you already know
and i fear one day
i'll push again
this time harder
and you'll be gone
this time for good
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/6625.html

The Lost Soul

What sign of the Black Zodiac are you?
brought to you by Quizilla
You are The Oracle, from "The Matrix."
Wise, kind, honest- is there anything slightly
negative about you? You are genuinely
supportive of others. Careful not to let people
take advantage of you, though.

What Matrix Persona Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/6202.html

watching you
is like watching me
you are everything i am
and everything i yearn to be
we come together
like moths, attracted to a flame
knowing when the flame burns out
we will be alone
but we keep coming back
if only for that brief moment
where the flame burns bright
and we both become lost
in what could be
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/5763.html

i know i have friends, they always seem to be reminding me
but that doesn't stop me from feeling very, very alone sometimes.  
even while i am surrounded by them

only one has ever been able to see through this smile i always have on.  
cuz you see, that is me, always smiling, no-matter-what
i've often had people ask me how i could still manage to smile after some of the things i've been through.  i can't recall all the answers i've had in response.  
sometimes smiling is just easier,
less questions
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/5582.html

i just don't feel as if

...i fit

my puzzle piece came out of the factory
DeFeCtIvE
many times i seem to fit
only to find
no
no, i don't belong there

so
where do i go
i always seem to be conforming
trying to mold myself to fit
fit into a preconcieved notion
of who everyone else thinks i should be

so do i really have a space
perhaps...
perhaps i'm just trying to fit into the wrong ones

but if so
...where do i fit
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/5049.html

as the bitter tears fall down my face i wonder
how i can face all that is

i've dealt with turbulent times
fucked up minds
people who throw out hurtful words like rhymes
what more can one take

there isn't a light at the end of this tunnel
it is like a train that cannot change course
i want off
but it's impossible
so i continue plunging along
through this dark, endless tunnel
i see no end

but i am empty

this is not what i want
or even where i want to be
but how i get to be where i want
is still
an unaswerable question to me
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/4764.html

she peers inside and tries to find
the secret he tries to hide
he's afraid that once she sees
she'll turn her back and leave
she wants more than he's willing to give
he'd rather die, than to see her leave
and so she pries inside
and still can't find what it is he hides
she loves him but she leaves
she can't see it was meant to be
and what he hid that he would not show
was just how much he loved her so
so much that it made him weak
and out of fear, he refused to speak
but off she went without a trace
but in her heart she'll never replace
what once she had and threw away
all because she refused to stay
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/4543.html

sometimes i wonder
why all the things you said
were only real inside your head
who where you trying to impress?
the answer is me, i guess
i never liked you for what you said you had
and all those sob stories only made me feel bad
you lied from the start
to get into my heart
but where it got you instead
was all alone in your bed
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/4247.html

i see a few of the relationships i have in an entirely different light after this weekend
i've always been one to keep much of what i'm thinking to myself.  
every time i am and have been hurt by something or someone i build walls
that's just me
and i distance myself, to make things easier, for me
you see, it's all about me
and i find myself running to put in this distance
only to realize i've been running in the wrong direction
it's all a contradiction
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/3708.html

Dream, the third of The Endless, you are in charge
of the Dreaming, all imagination and
creativity, everyone knows your beautiful
realm, but none truly understand it. You are
dark and brooding, creative, and spend a lot of
time by yourself, just thinking. You are almost
as serious as Destiny, but not quite. Everyone
is enchanted by you, but you keep them all at a
distance, even when you shouldn't.

Which Endless are you?
brought to you by Quizilla
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/3372.html

you know how its said, you don't know what you have until it's gone?

well, i don't think thats completely true for me.  
i knew what i had
i just thought i would be able to handle losing it

***

i never really intended to use this journal for much besides putting some poetry in it.
because i don't really like to talk about what is going on inside my head
but, its interesting how it seems so much easier for me to write in here because no one i know in person reads this.  or if they do, i don't know about it and they don't know its me

so perhaps if its okay,
i will begin to use this journal more often to express how i feel about things
it just might be good for me
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/3199.html

sometimes i think,
i just make things harder than they really are,
or need to be.
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/2924.html
a minute seems like an awful long time to waste... ~movie, a life less ordinary
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/2644.html

all i can say is why
i won't pretend to understand

all i can do is tell you,
i'm here when you need me
always more than willing to talk,
or better yet, listen
while others are walking out 
i am walking in
we were never the best of friends
but we are friends
even if we don't see each other much
remember all the fun we had together?
catching fireflies,
singing in the rain,
bouncing balls across the street.
i do
i remember
but things changed, as they always do
and somewhere along the way,
we grew up
surprising isnt it?
but i don't believe we really knew
until a moment in time changed everything
when i found out, i cried
for you and for myself
for the innocence lost along the way
i believe we are both victims,
victims of that circumstance
and now, its too late to go back
i can never say what i should have said
that chance is lost forever,
just as yours was stolen away
i still don't understand
maybe i never will
it doesn't really matter now
although, sometimes...
sometimes i wish we could go back
and sometimes i wonder
could i have changed things?
and if i could,
would you have made it different?
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/2316.html

<center>an angel 
sent from heaven you were
sent down to teach
and to learn
you've taught others
some you don't even know
you'll never know the way 
you've touched my life
you'll never know how
your soul made me cry
a beautiful life
sent with a message
you'll always live on
far after your gone
through friends,
in me
an angel you were
one i never did meet
but a soul so true
i'll never forget
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/2123.html

<center>said we cant be together
and i see why
but sometimes i wonder
really....why?
why must the timing be off
why must the places be wrong
why must we be so close
yet two worlds apart
our relationship isn't tangible
yet i want it more than anything
i want to be with you constantly
yet not
you've changed everything
i've known about myself
and helped me realized
we are not
two worlds apart at heart
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/1977.html

<center>love
battered in the wind
rippled by the tide
has come once more
is once more enough this time
was it even enough the first
can it be salvaged
star crossed lovers it seems
always finding the wrong place
and time
our next lifetime 
might prove something more
something better
until then perhaps this is how we are meant to be
always exsisting with an outstreched hand
falling millimeters short of yours
always seeing but never really grasping
wanting more and getting less
my hand falls to my side
i look away and sigh
i can no longer feel you
it makes me empty inside
love still exsists
it was just misplaced for now
in this lifetime at least
what the future holds, no one knows
my only hope is one day to see you
reaching out
and that it is not to late
to reach back
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/1669.html

<center>beauty
your words
and kindness
humor,
never ending
vulnerability
just beneath the suface
don't dig too deep
blood still flows from old wounds
you don't want to cover youself
opening the pages 
of books long closed
but always near
in it
through you
with you
i can see
beauty
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/1422.html

<center>does it feel as if we are the same
i used to be able to sense you
feel your thoughts
now i'm uncertain
it scares me to reach out
only to grasp emptiness
can you feel it?
the space between
our friendship was always so effortless
so unlike any other
always able to communicate
what mere words could never express
i feel as if that is lost
as if i've lost you
so i keep reaching into the emptiness
attempting to find
what we've left behind
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/1234.html

<center>i am screaming
doesn't anyone hear
screaming to be set free
removing all expectations
and potential disappointments
removing these masks i have worn
is that way you cannot hear me?
these cumbersome masks?
beneath them you will find me
don't you want to see?
i need some help however,
the masks won't fall away on their own
they have been static for for to long
beneath them are the screams,
calling for help
by my calls fall unheeded
they fall with the autumn leaves
the crinkle under your feet 
is the remains of my call
buy you pay it no mind
you're far to used to the sound
so here i'll remain
behind these masks
until someone takes the time to see through
will that someone be you?
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/957.html

<center>how do i
let go of all these insecurities
let go to finally see
what can become of me
you help me realize
all i have to give
and how i want to
give it all to you
how amazing it is
to find someone like you
your like my star in the night
there to be my light
just when i thought all was lost
and i was hopeless and scared
you came along
and showed me you cared
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/612.html

<center>i don't know you at all
sure, i've seen your face
and i know your name
you've probably even seen me
but i still don't know you
i do know, you've had it rough
you've lived your life,
seeming fine,
but your hurting inside
i can see it in your eyes
so much bad to become one person
undeservingly
and through it all 
you've never once lost yourself
i commend you
you are stronger than i
i know you hurt though,
and you will for quite some time
so many tough draws 
to one so sweet and kind
you will be fine
you will persevere
i can see that in your eyes too
through your eyes,
your hurt and strength shine through
you give me the courage to go on
i've seen what you've been through
and then all my troubles don't seem so rough,
through your eyes
http://night-whispers.livejournal.com/399.html
